summary: Veteran received consent form 10-5345 with instructions mailed by Consolidated Patient Account Center (CPAC) located at this facility. After receiving the information, he realized that the information printed on the back of two separate pages was billing information for two other Veterans. This Veteran returned the entire package to a Release Of Information Clerk late Friday, January 4th. The initial letter is dated December 10, 2012.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
